com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Interface IYRCRelatedTasksExtensionContributor


  • public interface IYRCRelatedTasksExtensionContributor
    Instances of this class handle related tasks which have been added through extensibility. This interface should be implemented when the requirement is to open a screen in an application shipped editor through extensibility.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptTask(YRCEditorInput editorInput, YRCRelatedTask relatedTask)
      Utility method called when the tasks are being displayed in the related tasks view.
      boolean canExecuteNewTask(YRCEditorInput editorInput, YRCRelatedTask currentTask)
      Utility method called to check if a new task can be started in the current editor.
      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite createPartControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent, YRCEditorInput editorInput, YRCRelatedTask currentTask)
      Create the panel which needs to be displayed on the current editor.

    • Method Detail

      • createPartControl

        org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite createPartControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                                    YRCEditorInput editorInput,
                                                    YRCRelatedTask currentTask)
        Create the panel which needs to be displayed on the current editor.

        This method is called when an editor is opened with a task which is marked as extensible.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent composite using which you should create your screen.
        editorInput - Editorinput of the current editor.
        currentTask - Task to be opened.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        YRCEditorInput.setTaskName(String), YRCRelatedTaskAction.executeTask(IAction, YRCEditorInput, YRCRelatedTask)

      • acceptTask

        boolean acceptTask(YRCEditorInput editorInput,
                   YRCRelatedTask relatedTask)
        Utility method called when the tasks are being displayed in the related tasks view.

        Use this method to decide if a certain task needs to displayed in the view or not.
        Parameters:
        editorInput -
        relatedTask -
        Returns:
        True is the related task needs to be displayed.

      • canExecuteNewTask

        boolean canExecuteNewTask(YRCEditorInput editorInput,
                          YRCRelatedTask currentTask)
        Utility method called to check if a new task can be started in the current editor.
        Parameters:
        editorInput -
        currentTask -
        Returns:
        True if the new related task can be executed.
